imdb.plot outline: Riley and Scott have been trying to make a great Emory-centric comedy series. They haven't had much luck and are looking for something to give their show the spark that it needs. The fledgling writers decide that a cameo by Dooley could take a show to the next level, but there's one problem, Dooley's arrogant agent. Just when Riley and Scott have given up hope yet again, a surprise appearance by another great Emory figure may cause their fortunes to change.
imdb.title: On Air
plot: Riley and Scott have been trying to make a great Emory-centric comedy series. They haven't had much luck and are looking for something to give their show the spark that it needs. The fledgling writers decide that a cameo by Dooley could take a show to the next level, but there's one problem, Dooley's arrogant agent. Just when Riley and Scott have given up hope yet again, a surprise appearance by another great Emory figure may cause their fortunes to change.::Anonymous
